ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Warrior?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are, but they re basically dead lists that no one posts on anymore. I get a good bit of info on this list and the EQ clerics list. There are also
ygData.messageBody:
--- Fuzhead@... wrote:
> I actually play a warrior on EQ, but my friend
> has a bard so i signed up for this Forum thingy

> Is there any warrior forum things like this
> that i can sign up for?

There are, but they're basically dead lists that
no one posts on anymore. I get a good bit of info
on this list and the EQ clerics list. There are
also some server specific message boards that
have some really good info as well. What
particular info are you looking for? Or are you
just looking for general information?



=====
Kinrea Keres 50th Teir'dal Warrior <Swift Law Coalition>
Danallis Stormcaller 40th Half Elven Druid <SLC>
Sinarya L'achesis 26th Teir'dal Necromancer <SLC>
Lereny 14th Half Elven Bard
Pippina 6th Vah Shir Beastlord
Saryrn Server
